articles.title: Greetings to Grand Duce of Luxembourg
articles.content:
Greetings to Grand Duce of Luxembourg
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Henri, grand duce of Luxembourg, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the relations between the DPRK and Luxembourg would develop in the common interests and sincerely wished the people of Luxembourg well-being.

articles.title: Premier Inspects Co-op Farms
articles.content:
Premier Inspects Co-op Farms
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju inspected the Naedong Co-op Farm in Kangryong County and the township co-op farm of Ongjin County.
					 While seeing people working hard to prevent the drought damage, he underlined the need to overcome the damage in the agricultural front and encouraged the officials and agricultural workers and helpers from ministries and national institutions in the anti-drought campaign.
					
					 At an onsite consultative meeting, measures were taken to tap the water sources to cope with a long spell of drought and heat temperature and for ministries and national institutions and other relevant units to provide the farms with vehicles and materials on a preferential basis to carry out the campaign.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Accuses U.S. of Slandering Humanitarian Measure
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Accuses U.S. of Slandering Humanitarian Measure
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Friday released the following statement over the fact the U.S. administration authorities are heating up the anti-DPRK smear campaign by abusing the humanitarian measure taken by the DPRK as an inhuman act, concerning the death of Warmbier, an American citizen:
					 Warmbier is clearly a criminal sentenced to reform through labor in accordance with the DPRK law on March 16, 2016 for the hostile act he committed against the DPRK on an assignment from an anti-DPRK plot-breeding organization of the U.S.
					
					 As was made public to the world, during the press conference on February 29, 2016, Warmbier confessed in tears that he had committed hostile act against the DPRK, with connivance of the U.S. administration, after he received an assignment from the Z-Society of the Virginia University of the U.S. controlled by the Friendship United Methodist Church, an anti-DPRK plot-breeding organization of the U.S., and the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA).
					
					 CNN and other U.S. media outlets are still broadcasting the video of Warmbier admitting his crime and apologizing for it at the press conference in Pyongyang.
					
					 The DPRK-U.S. relations are in the most hostile and belligerent state, and the U.S. is making every frantic effort to disparage the prestige of the dignified DPRK and stifle it while imposing heinous sanctions and pressure unprecedented in history.
					
					 Although we had no reason at all to show mercy to such a criminal of the enemy state, we provided him with medical treatments and care with all sincerity on humanitarian basis until his return to the U.S., considering that his health got worse.
					
					 As for the groundless public opinion now circulating in the U.S. that he died of torture and beating during his reform through labor, the American doctors who came to the DPRK for repatriation of Warmbier will have something to say about it. 
					
					 They examined Warmbier and exchanged medical observations about him with our doctors. They recognized that his health indicators like pulse, temperature, respiration and the examination result of the heart and lung were all normal and that we provided him with medical treatment and brought him back alive whose heart was nearly stopped.
					
					 Now the former officials of the Obama administration publicize as their "achievement" the release of 10 American citizens granted by the humanitarian measures we had taken. They cannot but acknowledge the fact that we treat the detainees in accordance with international laws and standard.
					
					 The fact that Warmbier died suddenly in less than a week just after his return to the U.S. in his normal state of health indicators is a mystery to us as well.
					
					 It reminds us of an incident that Hunziker, an American citizen who had illegally crossed the border and entered the DPRK on August 24, 1996, died in less than a month after he returned home in perfect health accompanied by Bill Richardson, the then U.S. Congressman, on November 27 the same year thanks to our humanitarian measure.
					
					 At that time, the U.S had totally ignored and not even mentioned a word about his death. The point here is he was also an American citizen, was he not?
					
					 Warmbier is a victim of policy of "strategic patience" of Obama who was engrossed in utmost hostility and negation against the DPRK and refused to have dialogue with the DPRK.
					
					 Why the U.S. government which claims to care about the welfare of its citizens had not even once made an official request for the release of Warmbier on humanitarian basis during the Obama administration? The answer should be given by the U.S. itself.
					
					 Although Warmbier was a criminal who committed hostile act against the DPRK, we accepted the repeated requests of the present U.S. administration and, in consideration of his bad health, sent him back home on humanitarian grounds according to the adjudication made on June 13, 2017 by the Central Court of the DPRK.
					
					 However, the U.S. totally distorted this truth and dared to clamor about "retaliation" and "pressure" on the dignified DPRK while deliberately kicking up the smearing campaign against the DPRK. This is a frontal challenge and political plot against us.
					
					 To make it clear, we are the biggest victim of this incident and there would be no more foolish judgment than to think we do not know how to calculate gains and losses.
					
					 The smear campaign against DPRK staged in the U.S. compels us to make firm determination that humanitarianism and benevolence for the enemy are a taboo and we should further sharpen the blade of law.
					
					 The U.S. should ponder over the consequences to be entailed from its reckless and rash act.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Have to Stop Speaking Ill of DPRK and Send Back Its Citizens
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Have to Stop Speaking Ill of DPRK and Send Back Its Citizens
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Consultative Council for National Reconciliation gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Friday as regards an anti-DPRK farce over the "repatriation of detainees" being waged in south Korea over the issue of Warmbier who had recently been sent back to the U.S.:
					 Now being undertaken in south Korea is a frantic confrontation racket against the DPRK as Warmbier died in the middle of treatment in the U.S. The American man had served a prison term after being sentenced to it for committing hostile acts against the DPRK and was sent back to the U.S. as a humanitarian measure taken by the DPRK.
					
					 The conservative opposition parties including the Liberal Korea Party and conservative media are talking about "heinous cruelty", "subhuman torture" and "strong denunciation".
					
					 On June 22, some ruling and opposition lawmakers held a press conference at the "National Assembly" where they submitted a "resolution" demanding a "probe into truth by the international community" and "denouncing the violation of human rights".
					
					 Even the chief executive of south Korea went busy, sending a "message of sympathy" to the U.S. He, in an interview with CBS, talked about "unwarranted and brutal treatment" and "crucial responsibility".
					
					 Those, who are utterly ignorant of how we treated Warmbier from a humanitarian standpoint, are spouting such rubbish as "brutal acts" and "tortures". It is needless to say that those acts are prompted by the intrinsic nature of pro-U.S. servants keen on tarnishing the image of the DPRK and currying favor with their master U.S.
					
					 What is all the more ridiculous is that the south Korean authorities are clamoring for the "repatriation of detainees" with the recent issue as a pretext.
					
					 It is the height of folly and impudence for the puppet forces to use the Warmbier issue for calling for "repatriation" of criminals who were arrested and sentenced to heavy penalty for committing hideous crimes against the DPRK.
					
					 To talk about "repatriation" of criminals who are in the middle of prison terms is an intolerable mockery and challenge to the law of the dignified DPRK.
					
					 If the puppet forces, so much clamoring for "concern" and "repatriation", are truly concerned for "humanitarianism", they have to immediately send back 12 DPRK women citizens whom they abducted in group in broad daylight and Kim Ryon Hui.
					
					 Lots of northerners now under detention in the south are anxiously looking forward to their repatriation to the homeland.
					
					 As was emphasized by the DPRK more than once, there can never be any humanitarian cooperation between the north and the south before the settlement of the repatriation issue of the DPRK citizens.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clearly know that they can never cover up their unethical nature no matter how loudly they speak about "detention" and "repatriation" just like a thief getting afraid of his shadow. And they should immediately send back all the DPRK citizens on whom they are practicing persecution after detaining them against reason.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Actions Denounced by Democratic Lawyers Association of Korea
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Actions Denounced by Democratic Lawyers Association of Korea
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Democratic Lawyers Association of Korea released a statement on June 22 as regards the fact that the evil law of the confrontational era is still rampant in south Korea to suppress democracy and truth.
					 Shortly ago, the south Korean judicial authorities held the final hearing on an appeal at the Seoul High Court and demanded five years in prison for an inhabitant, who posted an article praising the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu on websites and called for reunification through alliance, on charges of violation of the "Security Law".
					
					 On June 13 they held a trial of a reverend and sentenced him to three years in prison on charges of espionage that he was linked with the north during the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 The statement said that such fascist actions are unpardonable challenge to the mindset of the people valuing justice and conscience and yearning for a new politics and life and an anachronistic attempt to stem the trend of the times toward national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities outwardly talk a lot about the development of the north-south relations, but are inwardly seeking to arrest the atmosphere for reunification through alliance with the north. This is an open denial of the DPRK and an undisguised declaration of their intention to go for confrontation with fellow countrymen just like the conservative regimes.
					
					 They are advised to draw a lesson from the miserable fate of Park Geun Hye who was expelled from Chongwadae before the expiry of her term of office and imprisoned while getting hell-bent on violation of human rights and confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 It is the unanimous demand of all Koreans and the international community to abrogate the "Security Law", an evil law against human rights and reunification.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should resolutely say good-bye to the heinous confrontational policy towards the fellow countrymen, abolish the "Security Law", an evil law of outdated era, and set free unreasonably imprisoned pro-reunification patriots at once, if they truly wish improved north-south ties and reunification.
					
					 If they persist in the reckless treacherous moves to trample down the justice and truth while going against the trend of the era and the mindset of the people, they will be cursed and denounced by the whole nation.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, on June 15 received a message of greeting from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico (WPM).
					 The message expressed the highest tribute to leader Kim Jong Il, on behalf of all members and the national leader of the WPM, ahead of June 19, the 53rd anniversary of his start of work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a great revolutionary, outstanding leader and veteran of international politics who strengthened the WPK and had always led to victory the struggle of the Korean people to defend the country's sovereignty from the imperialists' vicious threat of aggression and build a socialist economic power, it said.
					
					 The message sincerely wished Kim Jong Un bigger success in his noble work for victoriously leading the cause of Juche revolution.

articles.title: Korean Youths and Farmers Vow Revenge on U.S.
articles.content:
Korean Youths and Farmers Vow Revenge on U.S.
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Members of the youth league and the union of agricultural workers in the DPRK met at the Sinchon Museum and the Susan-ri House of Class Education in Kangso District on Friday to vow revenge on the U.S. imperialist aggressors, ahead of the day of anti-U.S. struggle.
					 At the meetings, the reporters and speakers referred to the fact that the U.S. imperialists ignited a war in June 1950 to nip the young DPRK in its cradle and committed brutal massacres in Sinchon County during the strategic temporary retreat, stressing that those American cannibals are hordes of cruel butchers in human skin and sworn enemy of the Korean nation.
					
					 The U.S. beasts massacred one third of the guiltless inhabitants of Susan-ri in more than 40 days, they noted, saying the Korean people will never forget their thrice-cursed atrocities.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are now getting hell-bent on the scheme for a nuclear war against the DPRK by introducing huge nuclear strategic assets into south Korea, far from drawing a lesson from their bitter defeat in the last Korean War, they said, adding:
					
					 If they dare ignite a war on this land again, we will wipe out the enemies once and for all and make them pay for the blood shed by the Korean nation thousand fold.

articles.title: FIFA High-Level Coaching Course Held in DPRK
articles.content:
FIFA High-Level Coaching Course Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) --- A FIFA high-level coaching course was given at the Kim Il Sung Stadium in the DPRK from June 19 to 23.
					 Present there were men and women coaches from premier league teams of the country.
					
					 The course was officiated by Kwok Ka Ming, a lecturer of FIFA.
					
					 It was held divided into theoretical and practical sections and dealt with such subjects as the role of coaches and methods of coaching.
					
					 It served as an occasion for improving their practical ability.

articles.title: "Unhasu"-trademarked Medicinal Cosmetics
articles.content:
"Unhasu"-trademarked Medicinal Cosmetics
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory in the DPRK has developed various kinds of "Unhasu"-trademarked medicinal cosmetics.
					 Unlike the functional cosmetics with the effects of skin protection or prevention of aging, the newly-developed cosmetics are highly efficacious for skin diseases like acne.
					
					 Trial products are on sale at shops in Pyongyang, gaining popularity. Among them are an acne-treatment cream, acne-prevention lotion and mosquito repellent perfume.
					
					 In this regard, Pak Un Chol, a doctor at the Skin-disease Preventive Centre under the Ministry of Public Health, told KCNA:
					
					 There are many kinds of functional cosmetics made of extracts of natural herbs like Kaesong Koryo Insam in the country.
					
					 But the medicinal cosmetics contain only effective ingredients which were extracted from insam, clove, turmeric, Amur cork and other Koryo medicinal herbs and went through separation and refining processes for higher curative value.
					
					 Now the factory is producing over ten kinds of medicinal cosmetics.

articles.title: U.S. Talk about "Protection of S. Korea" Denounced
articles.content:
U.S. Talk about "Protection of S. Korea" Denounced
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is forcing south Korea in an all-round way over the issue of THAAD deployment, discontent with the south Korean authorities' delay in the deployment.
					 High-ranking officials of the Departments of State and Defense and Congress vie with each other to claim that THAAD is the indispensable weapon of the U.S. forces "protecting south Korea" and that its deployment plan can never be cancelled.
					
					 Meanwhile, a heavyweight of the U.S. marines stressed the need to let an operational unit permanently station in south Korea.
					
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Friday says:
					
					 "Threat from north Korea" cited by the U.S. is to cover up its sinister intention to militarily surround big powers of the region and permanently keep south Korea as bridgehead, nuclear advanced base and forward observation base for Asian invasion and thus hold a military edge in the region.
					
					 Loud voices about "protection of south Korea" from the U.S. political circle are sheer deceptive and shameless.
					
					 No matter what kind of rhetoric the U.S. may use to cover up its nature as the chieftain of aggression, it will never work on anyone.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Should Promote Unity: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Should Promote Unity: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities should draw a lesson from the preceding conservative regimes' confrontation policy and promote the unity and cohesion of the nation, far from the conception of antagonizing the compatriots in the north. This is a unanimous demand of the present era and all Koreans, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 But, the present authorities of south Korea fail to discard the old conception of confrontation, reading the faces of the U.S. and the conservative forces, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Anti-DPRK sanctions and pressure are an open declaration for confrontation as they are a treacherous deed of following the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Therefore, it is unreasonable for them to call for improved north-south relations, talking about sanctions and pressure accompanied by dialogue and contact, and this is deception and mockery of the compatriots.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have true will to improve the north-south relations and open up broad avenue to peace and reunification, they should stop all hostilities they stage against the compatriots, in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 When they try to give impression that there is something different from the past by allowing visits of some non-governmental organizations while turning aside the settlement of key issues, no substantial progress will be made in the north-south relations.
					
					 What the DPRK demands is that the north and the south open a new phase of national reconciliation and unity, recognizing each other as partner of reunification and joining their hands.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities continue to go for confrontation, refusing to accept this will and intention, we will make our own option.
					
					 The confrontation of social systems leads to physical conflict in the end. If the south Korean authorities disregard our stand and persist in the confrontation of social systems, we will have no other way but to go for reunification by non-peaceful means.
					
					 They should clearly understand this.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Chief Executive's Paradox
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Chief Executive's Paradox
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive, making a "celebration address" on June 15, asserted that his regime would approach to dialogue without any condition if the north stops its additional nuclear and missile provocation.
					 He talked rubbish that "complete dismantlement of the north's nukes", "establishment of peace-keeping system" and even "normalization of the north-U.S. ties" can be tabled if "dialogue" opens.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Friday says:
					
					 What the chief executive uttered constitutes an act of treachery that follows in the footsteps of the former conservative regime which brought the north-south ties to total collapse, pursuant to the U.S. heinous moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Not on a simple day but on the day marking the anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, the chief executive voiced support for the U.S. racket for imposing sanctions on the DPRK, prioritizing outsiders, not compatriots. This is just an undisguised treason that destroyed the main spirit of the north-south joint declaration and an open declaration to escalate confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 The nuclear deterrent of the DPRK for self-defence is not just a physical means targeting the compatriots in the south.
					
					 It is just an asset common to all Koreans that will put an end to the aggravating U.S. threat of aggression and provide an environment favorable for peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 There is no need to worry about it.
					
					 The south Korean regime is going so foolish as to dream a wild dream for settling the nuclear issue, paying heed only to the backbiting of outsiders seeking to sow discord among Koreans, although it is the issue that should be settled between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly hope for peace on the Korean peninsula and safety of the nation, they should make a U-turn in their policy to frustrate the aggression and intervention of outsiders by pooling efforts of all Koreans.

articles.title: Papers Call for Campaign to Prevent Drought Damage
articles.content:
Papers Call for Campaign to Prevent Drought Damage
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK's leading newspapers Friday editorially call upon the whole country to turn out in a campaign to prevent drought damage. 
					 Noting that a long spell of drought and heat temperature is adversely affecting crop growth, Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The campaign to prevent drought damage is a battle to defend the Party Central Committee and the dignity of socialist country.
					
					 How to overcome the drought damage is a vital issue to attain the grain production target, set forth by the Party, and speed up the victorious advance of socialism while foiling the hostile forces' moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 It is the revolutionary nature and fighting spirit of the Korean army and people to respond to the Party's call with devotion and practice.
					
					 All the officials, party members and other people should cherish the Party's call in their minds with patriotism and loyalty and give full rein to their devoted and strong fighting spirit in the campaign to prevent drought damage.
					
					 Minju Joson calls on all the people to turn out in the anti-draught campaign and glorify this year of epochal significance in carrying out the five-year strategy for national economic development with increased grain production.

articles.title: Illegal Sanctions Can Never Be Tolerable: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Illegal Sanctions Can Never Be Tolerable: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Recently, European countries are strongly reacting against the fact that the U.S. Senate adopted a bill on sanctions expansion against Russia.
					 The bill which was cooked up, taking issue with Russia's "invasion of Ukraine", intervention in the U.S. presidential election, etc. involves not only Russian enterprises but also European ones participating in project for building the gas pipeline Russia-Europe Northern Stream-2.
					
					 The German foreign minister and the Austrian chancellor promptly published a joint statement in which they strongly declared "they could not accept illegal and extraterritorial attempt for sanctions," claiming that the new sanctions of the U.S. violate an international law and threaten the energy security of the EU.
					
					 Disclosing that the bill pursues the only aim at placing the upper-hand of the U.S. by pushing Russia beyond gas export to the European market, they stressed that political sanctions should not be linked with economic interests.
					
					 The German minister of Economy warned that Germany would take a retaliatory measure if Trump ratifies the bill, and the EU Commission and France demanded that the U.S. should discuss the sanctions against Russia upon consultation with its allies of Europe.
					
					 It is too natural that the U.S. sanctions are opposed and rejected by the international community as they unhesitatingly harm the interests of other countries and regions according to its interests and standards only, indifferent to international law.
					
					 The U.S. is frantically conducting the unjust and illegal sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK, taking issue with the latter's exercise of the right to self-defence to cope with the former's extreme hostile policy and nuclear threat to the latter.
					
					 The cruel and barbarous nature of the U.S. sanctions against the DPRK is beyond imagination as they are to deprive our state of its right to development and our people of their right to existence.
					
					 The U.S. has brandished the stick of sanctions against the countries aspiring for the independent life, being disobedient to it. Now it is to brandish the stick of sanctions against the European countries which are called its allies.
					
					 The reality shows that when the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices are permitted and any country support them, it can never escape from the target of the U.S. sanctions in the future.
					
					 The international community should never allow the U.S. sanctions to turn the world into an era of mediaeval darkness.

articles.title: Opening Results of Investigation into Environment Pollution at U.S. Military Base Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Opening Results of Investigation into Environment Pollution at U.S. Military Base Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The People's Solidarity for the Revision of Unequal SOFA in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on June 15 in demand of opening the results of investigation into the environment pollution of the Ryongsan U.S. military base, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 In a press release the organization said the Ryongsan base is censured as the most polluted environment among the U.S. bases as no measures have been taken to prevent benzene leaked to be 500 times the tolerance limit of the underground water in the base.
					
					 It urged the Ministry of Environment to inform the south Korean people of the environment pollution of the Ryongsan base and force the U.S. forces to be responsible for it by applying the principle of polluter.
					
					 It also underscored the need for the present "government" to accept the issue of environmental pollution as "state affairs" and settle the long-standing environmental pollution.

articles.title: Action for Erecting Statues of Girl Sexual Slave Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for Erecting Statues of Girl Sexual Slave Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- An action was launched in Kwangju of south Korea to erect a girl statue accusing the Japanese imperialists of their sexual slavery, according to the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo.
					 A promotion committee for erecting a girl statue of peace in North District of Kwangju held a candlelight rally on June 7, at which it recalled that they had conducted information activities every Wednesday to erect the statue in Kwangju.
					
					 The committee appealed to students and youths to stand in the van of the action for the erection of the statue.

articles.title: S. Koreans Call for Dissolving Traitorous Political Party
articles.content:
S. Koreans Call for Dissolving Traitorous Political Party
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The public campaign demanding dissolution of a political party of traitors is getting brisk in south Korea, according to the south Korean newspapers Herald Economy and Jaju Sibo.
					 Citizens, angered by the acts of the "Liberal Korea Party" going against the public mindset, formed an organization called the "Citizens Wanting Dissolution of the Liberal Korea Party" and are staging protest rallies every day before the LKP building.
					
					 They accused the LKP of putting brake on the policies of the present regime of south Korea under an absurd pretext.
					
					 South Korean websites are reportedly awash with articles demanding dissolution of the LKP.

articles.title: Abolition of Evils in Media Urged
articles.content:
Abolition of Evils in Media Urged
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of Seoul on June 16 carried an article demanding the ouster of those who served at the conservative regime's beck and call.
					 The Press Trade Union announced a list of 101 persons including VIPs for the abolition of the evil practices for controlling the press three times, the paper said.
					
					 It said that those who were at Lee Myung Bak's and Park Geun Hye's beck and call are holding the high-ranking posts in KBS, MBC, Yonhap News and major media organs

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Ridicules Police Agency's "Apology" for Death of Peasant
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Ridicules Police Agency's "Apology" for Death of Peasant
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the Struggle for Paek Nam Gi of south Korea in a statement on June 16 denounced the deceptive "apology" made by the director of the Police Agency for killing a peasant Paek Nam Gi, according to the south Korean online newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 It is not understandable that the director of the police, which had never uttered a word of apology for killing the peasant with water-cannon since November 2015, suddenly appeared to make an apology, the organization said.
					
					 It urged the police to express its will to settle the case, calling for probing into the truth behind it and punishing those responsible for it.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed by the All-Russia Lenin Young Communist League on June 15.
					 Podzorov, first secretary of the league, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from June 15 to July 9 and decided to organize political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung in the period.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Germany
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on June 18.
					 The chairman of the forum was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from June 18 to July 8 and decided to significantly organize political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung and briskly conduct information activities through internet in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Thai Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Thai Organization
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand released a statement on June 19 to mark the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 After starting his work at the WPK Central Committee on June 19, 1964, HE Kim Jong Il had performed great exploits for the Korean people and the world's progressives through his brilliant ideo-theoretical activities and with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and successfully realized the cause of immortalizing the leader.
					
					 Under his leadership the DPRK frustrated the imperialists' moves to stifle it with the might of Songun and honorably defended the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation and demonstrated to the whole world its might as a politico-ideological and military power, a satellite manufacturing and launching state and a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 All the achievements made in the DPRK would have been unthinkable without the distinguished guidance of HE Kim Jong Il, the great leader.

articles.title: MINREX condena la demagogia anti-RPDC en el caso de Warmbier
articles.content:
MINREX condena la demagogia anti-RPDC en el caso de Warmbier
Pyongyang, 23 de junio (ACNC) -- En estos dias, las autoridades de la administracion norteamericana recrudecen la demagogia anti-RPDC calificando la medida humanitaria de esta como conducta inhumanitaria en relacion con el caso de la muerte del ciudadano estadounidense Warmbier.
					 Al respecto, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 23 una declaracion que sigue:
					
					  Evidentemente dicho, Warmbier es el criminal que en virtud de la ley de la RPDC fue sentenciado el 16 de marzo de 2016 a la pena de trabajo reformatorio por sus actos hostiles que ha cometido en cumplimiento de la mision que le asigno una entidad de conspiracion anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					  Como ya se ha publicado en el mundo, durante la entrevista de prensa concedida el 29 de febrero de 2016, el confeso entre lagrimas que habia cometido actos hostiles contra la RPDC, en connivencia de la administracion norteamericana, despues de que recibiera la mision desde la Sociedad-Z de la Universidad de Virginia de EE.UU., controlada por la Iglesia Metodista Unida de Amistad, organizacion de conspiracion anti-RPDC, y la CIA.
					
					  CNN y otros medios de prensa de EE.UU. transmiten todavia el video de Warmbier reconociendo sus crimenes y pidiendo disculpas en la conferencia de prensa ofrecida en Pyongyang.
					
					  Aunque no tenemos ninguna razon de dispensar misericordia a tal criminal del pais hostil, le ofrecimos desde la posicion humanitaria y con toda sinceridad el tratamiento medico hasta que el regresara a EE.UU., tomando en cuenta su mal estado de salud.
					
					  En cuanto al rumor infundado que circula ahora en EE.UU. segun el cual Warmbier murio a causa de las torturas y golpes recibidos durante el trabajo reformatorio, tendrian algo que decir los medicos estadounidenses que viajaron a la RPDC para la devolucion de Warmbier.
					
					  Ellos examinaron a Warmbier e intercambiaron con nuestros doctores el resultado de observaciones medicas.
					
					Reconocieron que son normales sus indices de vida, incluyendo el pulso, la temperatura, la respiracion y el resultado del examen de corazon y pulmon y que le hemos dado el tratamiento medico que logro salvar a el cuyo corazon casi dejaba de latir.
					
					Ahora, los ex funcionarios de la administracion Obama anuncian como su "merito" la liberacion de 10 norteamericanos segun las medidas humanitarias de la RPDC. Ellos no podrian negar el hecho de que tratamos a los detenidos de acuerdo con la ley y norma internacionales.
					
					Es una incognita para nosotros tambien la muerte subita de Warmbier a menos de una semana de su regreso a EE.UU. con normales indices de vida.
					
					El es una victima de la politica de "paciencia estrategica" de Obama quien cautivado de la extremada hostilidad y veto a la RPDC, vino negando el dialogo con esta.
					
					?Por que el gobierno estadounidense, que se cree interesado en la seguridad de su pueblo, no habra solicitado ni una vez por via oficial a la RPDC el problema de liberacion humanitaria de Warmbier durante la administracion Obama? 
					
					La respuesta a esta pregunta deberia dar el mismo EE.UU.
					
					Aunque Warmbier fue delincuente con antecedente hostil a la RPDC, hemos aceptado la reiterada solicitud de la actual administracion estadounidense y tomando en consideracion el mal estado de su salud, le permitio volver a casa desde el punto de vista humanitario y acorde a la adjudicacion del Tribunal Central fechada 13 de junio de 2017.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. tergiversa totalmente el hecho y levanta deliberadamente una campana de demagogia reclamando la "venganza" y "presion" contra la digna RPDC, lo cual deviene un desafio frontal y complot politico contra la segunda.
					
					Esta claro que la mayor victima del presente incidente es la RPDC. No habria el juicio mas estupido que pensar que la RPDC no sabe pasar las cuentas de ganancias y perdidas.
					
					La actual campana de difamacion anti-RPDC en EE.UU. nos obliga a redoblar la decision de que es un tabu el humanitarismo e indulgencia para los enemigos y hay que dar mas filo a la ley.
					
					EE.UU. debera meditar en serio las consecuencias de sus actos imprudentes.

articles.title: Portavoz del CRN exige devolucion inmediata de las ciudadanas de RPDC
articles.content:
Portavoz del CRN exige devolucion inmediata de las ciudadanas de RPDC
Pyongyang, 23 de junio (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional se entrevisto este viernes con la ACNC en relacion con que en el Sur de Corea se arma otra payasada anti-RPDC de reclamar la "devolucion de los retenidos" acusandola del problema del estadounidense Warmbier.
					Segun la respuesta dada por el, se ha desatado en el Sur de Corea la febril campana de enfrentamiento anti-RPDC con motivo de la muerte de Warmbier.
					
					Este norteamericano fue enjuiciado en el tribunal de la RPDC por sus actos hostiles y cumplia la pena de trabajo reformatorio, comento el portavoz y continuo:
					
					Segun la medida humanitaria de la RPDC, fue devuelto a EE.UU. y murio ahi mientras recibia el tratamiento medico.
					
					Considerando este caso como buena oportunidad para ofender a la RPDC, los partidos opositores como el "Partido de Corea Libre" y los medios de prensa conservadores del Sur de Corea expresan la "condena fuerte" hablando del supuesto "maltrato abominable" y "tortura infrahumana".
					
					Algunos "parlamentarios" del partido gobernante y de la oposicion concedieron el dia 22 una rueda de prensa en la "Asamblea Nacional" y presentaron el "proyecto de resolucion" que exige la "averiguacion de la responsabilidad por parte de la sociedad internacional" y "condena la violacion de derechos humanos".
					
					Hasta el mandatario surcoreano envio un "mensaje de consuelo" a EE.UU. y sostuvo una entrevista con la cadena norteamericana CBS pronunciando chismes como el "trato injusto y cruel" y la "grave responsabilidad".
					
					Los que hablan de "vejaciones" y "torturas" no saben ni jota del trato humanitario que hemos dado a Warmbier.
					
					Esa conducta es un movimiento instintivo de los sirvientes proyanquis que tratan de adular mas a su amo gringo manchando la imagen de la RPDC.
					
					Lo mas absurdo del caso es que las autoridades surcoreanas toman el caso de Warmbier por pretexto de su campana de exigir la supuesta "devolucion de los retenidos". 
					
					Es absurdo y cinico que con tal pretexto, los titeres surcoreanos demandan la "devolucion" de los criminales arrestados y sentenciados a penas severas por haber cometido tremendos crimenes anti-RPDC.
					
					 Hablar de la "devolucion" de los criminales en pleno cumplimiento de penas constituye una burla y desafio imperdonables a la digna ley de la RPDC.
					
					  Si los titeres surcoreanos, que hablan tanto de la "preocupacion" y "devolucion", tuvieran de verdad gran interes en el "humanitarismo", deberian devolver sin demora a las 12 ciudadanas norcoreanas raptadas en grupo a plena luz del dia y a Kim Ryon Hui.
					
					  Esperan con ansia la repatriacion numerosos habitantes de la RPDC, retenidos en contra de su voluntad en el Sur de Corea.
					
					  Como ya hemos subrayado repetidamente, no se lograra ninguna labor humanitaria entre el Norte y el Sur antes de que se resuelva el problema de devolucion de nuestros habitantes.
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas deben conocer bien que a pesar de sus disparates obstinados como "retencion" y "devolucion", no podran encubrir nunca su naturaleza antietica.
					
					Ellas tienen que devolver inmediatamente a todos nuestros ciudadanos, retenidos injustamente y sometidos a vejaciones.

articles.title: AJDC critica penas impuestas a personalidades patrioticas
articles.content:
AJDC critica penas impuestas a personalidades patrioticas
Pyongyang, 23 de junio (ACNC) -- El vocero de la Asociacion de Juristas Democraticos de Corea (AJDC) hizo publica el dia 22 una nota con respecto a que sigue vigente en el suelo surcoreano la ley infame de la era de confrontacion que esta acabando con la democracia y la verdad.
					Recientemente, las autoridades judiciales surcoreanas abrieron el juicio publico final sobre una apelacion en el Tribunal de Apelacion de Seul y sentenciaron a 5 anos de prision a un habitante surcoreano, quien publico en Internet el articulo de elogio a los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu y reclamo la reunificacion en alianza con el Norte (de Corea), acusandole de la violacion de la "ley de seguridad", comienza el documento y prosigue:
					
					El dia 13, concedieron un juicio sobre un pastor acusado durante el mandato de Park Geun-hye por la sospecha de espionaje en contacto con el Norte y le dictaron a 3 anos de carcel imputandole cargos inventados en su contra.
					
					Tales actos fascistas significan un intolerable desafio al pueblo surcoreano que aprecia la justicia y conciencia y aspira a la nueva politica y nueva vida y una locura anacronica para detener la corriente de la epoca actual hacia la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales y la reunificacion en alianza con el Norte.
					
					El comportamiento dual de las autoridades surcoreanas, que hablan tanto de la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, por una parte, y por la otra, lanzan la febril campana de represion para envenenar el ambiente de reunificacion en alianza con el Norte, deviene una negativa abierta a la connacional RPDC y la declaracion de seguir marchando por la senda de enfrentamiento fratricida al igual que los conservadores.
					
					Ellas deben sacar la leccion del destino tragico de Park Geun-hye, expulsada de Chongwadae antes de cumplir su mandato y encarcelada por su furiosa represion contra los DDHH y campana fratricida.
					
					La abolicion de la "ley de seguridad", la infame anti-DDHH y anti-reunificacion, es la exigencia unanime de todos los compatriotas y la opinion de la sociedad internacional.
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas desean de veras la mejora de vinculos intercoreanos y la reunificacion, deben separarse resueltamente de la perversa politica fratricida de la banda de Park, derogar la caduca "ley de seguridad" y excarcelar inmediatamente a las figuras patrioticas pro-reunificacion, encarceladas y ejecutadas injustamente.
					
					Ellas no podran evitar la maldicion y la condena de toda la nacion si siguen cometiendo el acto antinacional de sofocar la justicia y la verdad marchando en contrasentido a la corriente de la epoca y la opinion publica.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la campana de sancion de EE.UU. contra los Estados soberanos
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la campana de sancion de EE.UU. contra los Estados soberanos
Pyongyang, 23 de junio (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el senado del Congreso norteamericano aprobo el proyecto de ley de ampliacion de la sancion contra Rusia, lo cual causa el fuerte rechazo de los paises europeos.
					El proyecto, inventado cuestionando la "invasion a Ucrania" de Rusia y su intervencion en las elecciones presidenciales de EE.UU., incluye en la lista de blancos de sancion no solo las empresas rusas, sino las otras europeas que toman parte en el programa de construccion del gasoducto Rusia-Europa "Corriente del Norte-2".
					
					De inmediato, el ministro de RR.EE. de Alemania y el premier austriaco hicieron publica una declaracion conjunta criticando fuertemente que la nueva sancion norteamericana viola la ley internacional y amenaza la seguridad energetica de la Union Europea y no pueden aceptar el ilegal y extraterritorial intento de sancion.
					
					Revelaron que en virtud del susodicho proyecto, EE.UU. persigue contrarrestar a Rusia en la exportacion de gas al mercado europeo y opinaron que no se debe vincular la sancion politica con los intereses economicos.
					
					El ministro de Economia de Alemania advirtio que tomara las contramedidas en el caso de que Trump ratifique el proyecto. El Comite de la UE y Francia exigieron a EE.UU. consultar y tratar el asunto de sancion anti-Rusia con los paises aliados de Europa.
					
					Es natural que fuera rechazada por la sociedad internacional la sancion de EE.UU que perjudica los intereses de otros paises y regiones segun sus intereses y pauta sin tomar en consideracion el derecho internacional.
					
					Cuestionando el ejercicio del derecho a la autodefensa de la RPDC frente a la extremada politica hostil y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU., este recrudece la injusta e ilegal campana de sancion y presion contra aquella.
					
					Esta maniobra brutal y salvaje tiene el objetivo de suprimir el derecho al desarrollo de la RPDC y hasta el de existencia de su pueblo.
					
					EE.UU. quiere extender ahora su garrote de sancion hasta a los aliados europeos aunque lo esgrimia antes solo contra los paises desobedientes y aspirantes a la vida independiente.
					
					La realidad de hoy testimonia que si se toleran el despotismo y las arbitrariedades de EE.UU., ningun pais se liberara de las garras de sancion.
					
					La sociedad internacional no debe admitir nunca la campana de sancion de EE.UU que trata de hacer al mundo retroceder a la edad medieval.
